nodes.text: The monarchy of Pijal was the ruling planetary government located in the Pijal system of the Inner Rim.

By 40 BBY, it was led by Queen Fanry after her coronation. Queen Fanry attempted a revolt against the Czerka Corporation, which ultimately failed after Fanry faced a rebellion of her own. Fanry abdicated the crown to her cousin, Lamia, who dissolved the monarchy and created the Assembly, which was led by Governor Orth, formerly the minister to Fanry.
